title: JSON schema for OSTW lobby setting files.

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Assault' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Assault' mode.

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Control' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Control' mode.

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Escort' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Escort' mode.

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Hybrid' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Hybrid' mode.

Team Needs Flag At Base To Score.$ref: #/definitions/Team Needs Flag At Base To Score

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Deathmatch' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Deathmatch' mode.

Draw After Match Time Elapsed With No Ti.$ref: #/definitions/Draw After Match Time Elapsed With No Tiebreaker

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Elimination' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Elimination' mode.

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Team Deathmatch' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Team Deathmatch' mode.

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Skirmish' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Skirmish' mode.

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Practice Range' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Practice Range' mode.

General.description: The list of hero settings that affects both teams.

Team 1.description: The list of hero settings that affects team 1.

Team 2.description: The list of hero settings that affects team 2.

Description.description: The description of the custom game.
